titles.title: To rename Wolf Trap Farm Park as ``Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts'', and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended) by Unanimous Consent.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 107-330.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 202.

action.text: Mr. Gilchrest moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2440.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Bingaman without amendment. With written report No. 107-182.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 450.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 12/11/2001--Passed House amended. Amends the Wolf Trap Farm Park Act to rename Wolf Trap Farm Park for the Performing Arts as Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts.Exempts the Park from laws, rules, or regulations that are applicable solely to National Park System units that are designated as a "National Park."
